item.description:
THERE ARE SIGNIFICANT CHANGES FROM THE ORIGINAL EVENT! PLEASE REVIEW CAREFULLY!

(This is a family friendly series of events. Rain or Shine ONLY applies to lunch and the Ecotarium. The 10AM Apple picking/Farm event will be canceled if we get rain!)

Originally this was planned as an End of Summer Lunch at the Texas BBQ Company Restaurant in Northborough... Now there are at least 5 kids in the mix... and Rand Fan friends from the other side of the country joining us (accounting for 3 of the kids too!) ...

Come for good food, socializing, camaraderie, conversation and lots of fun!

And bring your kids (if you have them; rent or borrow if you don't and want to bring a child)!


Itinerary for the Day:

10AM: Meet at Tougas Farm for Apple Picking, Playground Fun, Check out the animals, etc.

Noon: Meet at The Texas BBQ Company Restaurant for Lunch

2:30PM: Meet at Ecotarium in Worcester.

 

10AM: Meet at Tougas Farm for Apple Picking, Playground Fun, Check out the animals, etc.

All the info about Tougas Farm is here: http://www.tougasfarm.com/. Looks like a blast! See you there! Directions, address, phone # ... all are here: http://www.tougasfarm.com/direct.html

 

Noon: Meet at The Texas BBQ Company Restaurant for Lunch

I have been told by a real-live Texan that the food at the Texas BBQ Co is authentic! (My mouth is watering already!!)

We'll meet at the restaurant at 12PM on Sunday, September 18 -- and likely be there until about 2PM -- or longer .

Restaurant Info: Texas BBQ Company, 309 Main St., Northborough, MA 01532. 508-393-4742 http://www.texasbbqco.com/

http://www.texasbbqco.com/directions.html

PLEASE RSVP AS SOON AS YOU CAN SO THAT I CAN GIVE THE RESTAURANT AN ACCURATE COUNT when I finalize the reservation this Friday! There is currently a maximum of 20 attendees allowed (Members + Guests) ... Attendance will be closed at 7PM on Friday, Sept. 16, 2011. So get your RSVP in!!

 

2:30PM: Meet at Ecotarium in Worcester.

 

All the info about the Ecotarium is here: http://www.ecotarium.org/. Been there before with my son. It is fun! Detailed Visitor Information is here: http://www.ecotarium.org/visitor/.

 

Any questions, please email Mark Shar, co-organizer of the Boston Ayn Rand Meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Mark Shar wearing his Aussie cowboy hat ... or ask for the meetup group ... I (Mark Shar) will be booking the reservation

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: End of Summer Fun Day + Lunch with Kid Fun Before & After Lunch! Starts at 10AM!
